casebody.data:
HEST TECHNOLOGIES, INC., et al., petitioners,
v.
NORTH CAROLINA, ex rel. Pat McCRORY, Governor, et al. No. 12-1369. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 7, 2013.

Case below, 366 N.C. 289, --- S.E.2d ----.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of North Carolina denied.
